long_description: The redesigned Black Diamond Speed 40 Pack offers lightweight performance and a streamlined design that excels during fast alpine forays on rock or ice. reACTIV suspension comfortably carries light loads over long distances; SwingArm(TM) shoulder straps move in concert with your stride and reach. Thermoformed back panel vents warm air and moisture. Removable hipbelt padding and top pocket let you pare down weight when you're heading for the top; skirt closure features a tuck-away rope strap. Internal pocket holds a hydration reservoir (sold separately) and provides hands-free drinking on the trail. The Black Diamond Speed 40 Pack features side compression straps, ice-tool loops, a 3-point haul system and removable crampon straps.
short_description: The redesigned Black Diamond Speed 40 Pack offers lightweight performance and a streamlined design that excels during fast alpine forays on rock or ice.
